########################################################################
# QT GUI file generation stuff (Q_OBJECT)
########################################################################
set(inspector_mod_includedir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include/SurfaceInspector)
set(QTGUI_MOC_HEADERS
  ${inspector_mod_includedir}/signal_marker.h
  ${inspector_mod_includedir}/inspector_form.h
)
QT5_WRAP_CPP(QTGUI_MOC_OUTFILES ${QTGUI_MOC_HEADERS})

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR} ${QT_INCLUDE_DIRS})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
list(APPEND SurfaceInspector_sources
    ${QTGUI_MOC_OUTFILES}
    SurfaceI_impl.cc
    inspector_form.cc
    signal_marker.cc
)

set(SurfaceInspector_sources "${SurfaceInspector_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT SurfaceInspector_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT SurfaceInspector_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector SHARED ${SurfaceInspector_sources})

include(GrPython)

target_link_libraries(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector PUBLIC PUBLIC gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio-fft gnuradio-filter qwt::qwt Qt5::Widgets Qt5::Core Qt5::Gui ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${QWT_LIBRARIES} ${PYTHON_LIBRARIES} ${QWTPLOT3D_LIBRARIES} ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})

if(ENABLE_PYTHON)
    target_compile_definitions(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector PUBLIC -DENABLE_PYTHON)
    target_link_libraries(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector PUBLIC ${PYTHON_LIBRARIES})
endif(ENABLE_PYTHON)

target_include_directories(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_SurfaceInspector_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-SurfaceInspector)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_SurfaceInspector_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-SurfaceInspector)

if(NOT test_SurfaceInspector_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_SurfaceInspector_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_SurfaceInspector_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("SurfaceInspector_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
